name: 10fastfingers Dark Theme by Vednoc (restyled)
description:
Hello there! This restyle was made by m1fer. 
I would like to mention Vednoc for his idea. 
I took his source code and rewrite it to make it much better. 
He did the biggest part of this code. Enjoy! :)

Original theme - https://userstyles.org/styles/137273/10fastfingers-minimalistic-dark-light-theme
Original author - https://userstyles.org/users/362890
additional_info:
Version: v1.1 (July 28, 2021)
          - Fixed "Custom Typing Text" Mode
          - Fixed "Top 1000" Mode
          - Fixed "Text Practice" Mode
          - Removed profile picture white frame
          - Fixed "Switch Typing Test language" menu

Version: v1.2 (September 3, 2021)
          - Fixed bug with graph
          - Fixed word box in "Text Practice" Mode

discussions.name: This is the most cleanest theme I've ever seen.
